nodes.bodyText: we need '' for mac. Is it not working on linux/windows?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ cd hc-qa-project
 if $DHS
 then
         env=dhs
-        sed -i '' "s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties
+        sed -i  "s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties

nodes.bodyText: No its not working on linux. We will be running on linux machines

nodes.bodyText:
Can we try using perl -i -pe"s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties instead.
Works in mac and hopefully works on all platforms.
